title: Yannick Clément Dedicates Revised Paper Thibault Heimburger and Colin Berry
post: I enjoyed helping Yannick with the paper and particularly enjoyed reading Ray’s (and other) quotes.
author: Andy Weiss

title: Yannick Clément Dedicates Revised Paper Thibault Heimburger and Colin Berry
post:
Congratulations Yannick (sincerely),
Of course, when you write “I dedicate my paper to Thibault Heimburger and Colin Berry who love to put into question all the conclusions of Rogers concerning the image!!!”
it can only be a joke.
Thibault.
author: Thibault HEIMBURGER
